h2.span: COVID-19 information for browning public schools

span.style: caret-color: rgb(224, 6, 39); font-size: 35px; font-family: bebas_neueregular; color: rgb(224, 6, 39);

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: "Helvetica Neue";
p.span: Welcome to Browning Public Schools – home of the Indians. Browning Schools is located in the heart of the Blackfeet Reservation proudly educating over 2,000 future leaders in grades Pre-Kindergarten through 12th. Our community continues to grow and thrive offering a variety of learning environments and opportunities for our students.
